about_the_game:
Add the following features to your experience of Warlocks Deeds.

Random Worlds
The world is generated procedurally, creating brand new variants of the world ready to be explored and looted. The name you give your world is used as the basis for the seed.

Explorer Mode
Play in explorer mode which allows you to explore and experience the world without worrying about what's around the next corner, All enemy creatures are prevented from spawning.

User Defined
Adjust various sliders allowing you to fine tune the games difficulty.

Hard Core
You get one life to live, If you die then that's the end of that world.

You also receive an extra piece of luck that helps in looting.

content_descriptors.notes: Unrealistic Mild cartoon violence, hitting chickens and fantasy creatures with various items including bows and axes.

detailed_description:
Add the following features to your experience of Warlocks Deeds.

Random Worlds
The world is generated procedurally, creating brand new variants of the world ready to be explored and looted. The name you give your world is used as the basis for the seed.

Explorer Mode
Play in explorer mode which allows you to explore and experience the world without worrying about what's around the next corner, All enemy creatures are prevented from spawning.

name: Warlocks Deeds - Uncharted Realms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0Ghz or faster multi core.
  • Graphics: At least 4 gig, OpenGL 3.3, GeForce 8800, Radeon HD 4200. Intel cards are not recomended but if you do use them then please reduce your draw distance to 15 chunks.
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: *The game will perform better the more cores you have. Whilst the game only required 300Mb to be installed it will require allot more space as it builds its maps. 2GB is quoted as being the average amount a completed map would take.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Gain access to various advanced features on Warlocks Deeds, Open up more of the what the world has to offer.
